abstract: Vikram S. Pandit confronts the daunting task of shoring up the company, which has been brought to its knees by the mortgage crisis.
snippet: Vikram S. Pandit confronts the daunting task of shoring up the company, which has been brought to its knees by the mortgage crisis.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup, the country’s largest bank and one of the biggest casualties of the turmoil in the credit markets, appointed Vikram S. Pandit as its chief executive today.

headline.main: Troubled Citigroup Names Pandit as Chief Executive
